articles.title: Hard Rock Hotel will be demolished in December 2020, more than a year after collapse
articles.description: The Hard Rock Hotel that collapsed in October will not be demolished until December 2020.
articles.content:
The Hard Rock Hotel in downtown New Orleans will not be brought down until December 2020, officials said Friday, more than a year after it collapsed on Oct. 12, 2019.
